office_file_no.title: Office File No
office_file_no.content: Your internal file reference number for tracking this case. Optional – can be added later.

notice_no.title: Notice / Reference No
notice_no.content: Notice/Form number from the department (e.g., ASMT-10/2025). Required to identify the case.

notice_date.title: Notice Date
notice_date.content: Date when the notice was issued by the department. Required for deadline calculation. System auto-suggests reply due date.

reply_due_date.title: Reply Due Date
reply_due_date.content: Deadline to submit response. Required for compliance tracking. System warns if approaching or overdue (amber for <7 days, red for <3 days).

issue_type.title: Primary Issue
issue_type.content: Select the primary issue type if known. Optional – you can add this later. Helps categorize and standardize cases.

case_owner.title: Case Owner
case_owner.content: Assign to Partner, CA, or Advocate. Required – only active team members with relevant roles shown. Contact admin to add new team members.

priority.title: Priority
priority.content: Set urgency level (High/Medium/Low) to help with workload prioritization. Optional – defaults to Medium.

current_stage.title: Authority Level
current_stage.content: The current position in the legal hierarchy - determines appeal routes and timeline tracking.

matter_type.title: Matter Type
matter_type.content: Type of assessment proceeding (only for Assessment stage). Optional.

period.title: Period
period.content: Tax period under dispute (e.g., Q1 FY2024-25, Apr-Jun 2024). Optional – if details available now.

tax_demand.title: Tax Demand
tax_demand.content: Tax amount disputed in the notice. Optional – if details available now.

interest_amount.title: Interest Amount
interest_amount.content: Interest demanded by the department. Optional – if details available now.

penalty_amount.title: Penalty Amount
penalty_amount.content: Penalty amount proposed/imposed. Optional – if details available now.

notice_number.title: Notice Number
notice_number.content: The unique reference number from the GST notice (e.g., ZA270325006940Y). Optional.

form_type.title: Notice Type
form_type.content: Type of GST notice received (e.g., DRC-01 for Show Cause Notice, ASMT-10 for assessment notice). Required to categorize the case.

section_invoked.title: Section Invoked
section_invoked.content: GST Act section cited in the notice (e.g., Section 73 for normal assessment, Section 74 for fraud cases). Optional.

financial_year.title: Financial Year
financial_year.content: FY covered by the notice (e.g., FY 2024-25). Optional – if details available now.

authority.title: Legal Forum / Issuing Authority
authority.content: The authority/court issuing the notice and handling this case. Determines jurisdiction and appeal routes.

city.title: City
city.content: City for jurisdiction determination. Optional – can be added later if not known.

specific_officer.title: Specific Officer Name
specific_officer.content: Name and designation of officer handling your case. Optional.

jurisdictional_commissionerate.title: GST Commissionerate
jurisdictional_commissionerate.content: The GST commissionerate with jurisdiction over this case. Optional.

department_location.title: Office Location
department_location.content: Physical location of the department office handling this case. Optional.
